response.overview: Recorded live in December 2009 at the O2 Arena, London. The Pet Shop Boys' performed classic songs such as 'West End Girls', 'Suburbia', 'Go West', as well as medleys and cover versions. The DVD also features various promo videos and the Brit Awards 2009 performance featuring Brandon Flowers & Lady GaGa.  Playlist : 1. More Than a Dream/Heart | 2. Did You See Me Coming? | 3. Pandemonium/Can You Forgive Her? | 4. Love Etc. | 5. Building a Wall | 6. Go West | 7. Two Divided by Zero | 8. Why Don't We Live Together? | 9. New York City Boy | 10. Always on My Mind | 11. Closer to Heaven/Left to My Own Devices | 12. Do I Have To? | 13. King's Cross | 14. The Way It Used to Be | 15. Jealousy | 16. Suburbia | 17. What Have I Done to Deserve This? | 18. All Over the World | 19. Se a vida Ã©/Discoteca/Domino Dancing/Viva la Vida | 20. It's a Sin | 21. Being Boring | 22. West End Girls
response.title: Pet Shop Boys: Pandemonium

titles.title: Pet Shop Boys: Pandemonium: Live at the O2 Arena, London, 21 December 2009
